item.title: Why Broadcom’s stock led the chip sector’s rally on Wednesday
item.description: Broadcom CEO Hock Tan has the potential for a big payday if he can hit “challenging” new targets for AI revenue.

item.title: Oracle’s stock just did something never seen before on Wall Street. Inside the historic move.
item.description: No company worth over $500 billion has ever gained more than 25% in a single day. Oracle’s stock increased by far more than that on Wednesday.

item.title: Klarna’s stock loses some steam in post-IPO debut, as traders gain access to fresh play on fintech
item.description: Klarna’s IPO comes in the aftermath of strong public debuts from Figma and Circle.

item.title: I’m 80 and my RMD is $300,000. What the heck am I supposed to do about my huge tax bill?
item.description: A teacher turned $600,000 into $6 million and now has a huge tax bill

item.title: Stablecoins could help the dollar remain the world’s No. 1 reserve currency — but not through Treasury-bill buying
item.description: Stablecoins could help the U.S. dollar stay the world’s No. 1 reserve currency, but not in the way that many have assumed, according to Deutsche Bank ...
